name: In re REGLAN/METOCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Petition of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of August, 2012, the Petition for Permission to Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
